definitions.definition: To adapt for use in a marine environment.
To temporarily inundate with water and/or other marine substances.
To equip (a boat) with sailors and other personnel required for an ocean voyage.

main_definition: To adapt for use in a marine environment.
secondary_definitions: To temporarily inundate with water and/or other marine substances.
To equip (a boat) with sailors and other personnel required for an ocean voyage.
